definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
person suffering (from a disease or poisoning)/a patient

sentences.chinese: 梦游病者做最奇怪的事。

sentences.english: Connect the Luer lock to the trocar port on the patient side.
sentences.chinese: 在病者傍边把针头锁接与套管针端口连接上。

sentences.english: Patients will be treated, and will be sent to compulsory treatment of drug addicts.
sentences.chinese: 患病者将被收治，而吸毒者将被送强制戒毒。

sentences.english: Former RCA workers petitioned the Executive Yuan for compensation for pollution-related injuries.
sentences.chinese: 前RCA员工为遭受污染而患病者向监察院请愿索赔。

sentences.english: For those who are ill, illness is an internal form of disharmony.
sentences.chinese: 对患病者来说，疾病是身体形态内在的不协调。

sentences.english: It's often helpful during an illness to talk to other sufferers .
sentences.chinese: 病中与同病者谈天常是有益的。

sentences.english: There is a long train of patients at the clinic queuing for treatment.
sentences.chinese: 诊所内有一长排病者轮候治疗。

sentences.english: The nursing of the sick, said Florence Nightingale, is a vocation as well as a profession.
sentences.chinese: 南丁格尔说，看护病者不仅是职业，也是天职。

definition: person suffering (from a disease or poisoning)/a patient
to apply a treatment/to undertake a therapy
